header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Family, work, plans for the weekend, planning a holiday to New York, past events (holidays and wedding), weather
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, requesting, anecdote telling, making arrangements

speaker.fls: Imogen has just started French and Spanish at school. At this point she only knows a few dozen words of these languages -- level unspecified
